verbs.description: [ARG1: The Trump - Russia story] [V: is] " [ARG2: an excuse by the Democrats for having lost an election] , " he said .

The Trump - Russia story is " an excuse by the Democrats for having lost an election , " [ARG0: he] [V: said] .
